value.string:
def getTitle(url=''):
 try:
 return context.getPortalObject().restrictedTraverse(url, None).getTitle()
 except AttributeError:
 return url.split('/')[-1]
 
 def compareFileName(a, b):
 return cmp(a.split('/')[-1], b.split('/')[-1])
 
 
 from Products.ERP5Form.Report import ReportSection
 REQUEST = context.REQUEST
 REQUEST.set('is_documentation_report', True)
 portal_skin = REQUEST.get('portal_skin')
 result = []
 root_class_name = REQUEST.get('class_name')
 class_methods_list = []
 property_sheets_list = []
 documentation_helper = context.getDocumentationHelper(REQUEST.get('class_name'), REQUEST.get('uri'))
 section_list = documentation_helper.getSectionList()
 result.append(
 ReportSection(
 title= "Overview of %s" % documentation_helper.getTitle())
 )
 result.append(
 ReportSection(
 selection_params=dict(title=documentation_helper.getTitle()),
 selection_name='documentation_helper_selection',
 path=context.getPortalObject().portal_classes.getRelativeUrl(),
 form_id='DocumentationHelper_viewReportSectionTitleDescription',
 listbox_display_mode='FlatListMode')
 )
 result.append(
 ReportSection(
 path=context.getPortalObject().portal_classes.getRelativeUrl(),
 level=1,
 method_id='getDocumentationHelper',
 form_id='%s_view' % documentation_helper.getClassName(),
 param_list=[documentation_helper.getClassName(),
 documentation_helper.getURI()],
 listbox_display_mode='FlatListMode')
 )
 for section in section_list:
 result.append(
 ReportSection(
 path=context.getPortalObject().portal_classes.getRelativeUrl(),
 level=2,
 title=section.title,
 form_id='')
 )
 result.append(
 ReportSection(
 selection_params=dict(title=section.title),
 selection_name='documentation_helper_selection',
 path=context.getPortalObject().portal_classes.getRelativeUrl(),
 form_id='DocumentationHelper_viewReportSectionTitleDescription',
 listbox_display_mode='FlatListMode')
 ) 
 for uri in section.getURIList():
 uri_object = context.getDocumentationHelper(section.getClassName(), uri) 
 result.append(
 ReportSection(
 path=context.getPortalObject().portal_classes.getRelativeUrl(),
 level=3,
 title=getTitle(uri),
 form_id='')
 )
 result.append(
 ReportSection(
 selection_params=dict(description=uri_object.getDescription()),
 selection_name='documentation_helper_selection',
 path=context.getPortalObject().portal_classes.getRelativeUrl(),
 form_id='DocumentationHelper_viewReportSubSectionTitleDescription',
 listbox_display_mode='FlatListMode')
 )
 result.append(
 ReportSection(
 path=context.getPortalObject().portal_classes.getRelativeUrl(),
 level=3,
 method_id='getDocumentationHelper',
 form_id='%s_view' % section.getClassName(),
 param_list=[section.getClassName(),
 uri],
 listbox_display_mode='FlatListMode')
 )
 if portal_skin is None or portal_skin == 'View':
 for child_uri in uri_object.getSectionList():
 class_name = child_uri.getClassName()
 results = context.DocumentationHelper_getDocumentationSectionListParams(class_name,
 child_uri.uri_list)
 result+=results[0]
 if root_class_name == "ERP5SiteDocumentationHelper":
 for sub_child_uri in child_uri.getSectionList():
 class_name = sub_child_uri.getClassName()
 results=context.DocumentationHelper_getDocumentationSectionListParams(class_name,
 sub_child_uri.uri_list)
 result+=results[0]
 elif portal_skin == "ODT" and root_class_name == "ERP5SiteDocumentationHelper":
 for child_uri in uri_object.getSectionList():
 class_name = child_uri.getClassName()
 child_uri_title = getattr(child_uri, 'title','')
 if child_uri_title == '':
 child_uri_title = child_uri
 result.append(
 ReportSection(
 path=context.getPortalObject().portal_classes.getRelativeUrl(),
 level=4,
 title=child_uri_title,
 form_id='')
 )
 result.append(
 ReportSection(
 selection_params=dict(description=child_uri_title),
 selection_name='documentation_helper_selection',
 path=context.getPortalObject().portal_classes.getRelativeUrl(),
 form_id='DocumentationHelper_viewReportPortalTitleDescription',
 listbox_display_mode='FlatListMode')
 )
 results = context.DocumentationHelper_getDocumentationSectionListParams(class_name,
 child_uri.uri_list)
 result+=results[0]
 class_methods_list+=results[1]
 property_sheets_list+=results[2]
 class_iterate_list = ['DCWorkflowDocumentationHelper', 
 'SkinFolderDocumentationHelper']
 section_class_name = class_name 
 sub_displayed_class = ['DCWorkflowScriptDocumentationHelper',
 'PageTemplateDocumentationHelper',
 'ScriptPythonDocumentationHelper',
 'ZSQLMethodDocumentationHelper']
 if root_class_name == "ERP5SiteDocumentationHelper" and section_class_name in class_iterate_list:
 for sub_child_uri in child_uri.uri_list:
 sub_child_object = context.getDocumentationHelper(section_class_name, sub_child_uri)
 for sub_child_section in sub_child_object.getSectionList(): 
 if sub_child_section.class_name in sub_displayed_class: 
 class_name = sub_child_section.class_name
 results=context.DocumentationHelper_getDocumentationSectionListParams(class_name,
 sub_child_section.uri_list, "%s:" % sub_child_object.getId())
 result+=results[0]
 class_methods_list+=results[1]
 property_sheets_list+=results[2]
 
 if portal_skin is not None and portal_skin=="ODT":
 if class_methods_list !=[] or property_sheets_list !=[]:
 result.append(
 ReportSection(
 level=2,
 title="Appendix",
 form_id='')
 )
 appendix_description="This section resume class methods and property sheets"
 appendix_description+=" used for documented business templates"
 result.append(
 ReportSection(
 selection_params=dict(description=appendix_description),
 selection_name='documentation_helper_selection',
 path=context.getPortalObject().portal_classes.getRelativeUrl(),
 form_id='DocumentationHelper_viewReportSubSectionTitleDescription',
 listbox_display_mode='FlatListMode')
 )
 classmethods = dict().fromkeys([x for x in class_methods_list]).keys()
 class_list = dict().fromkeys(['.'.join(x.split('.')[:-2]) for x in classmethods]).keys()
 class_list.sort()
 propertysheet = dict(zip([x.split('/')[-1] for x in property_sheets_list],property_sheets_list))
 if classmethods !=[]:
 result.append(
 ReportSection(
 level=3,
 title="Class Methods",
 form_id='')
 )
 class_method_description="This section describe the documentation of common class methods"
 class_method_description+=" used for documented business templates"
 result.append(
 ReportSection(
 selection_params=dict(description=class_method_description),
 selection_name='documentation_helper_selection',
 path=context.getPortalObject().portal_classes.getRelativeUrl(),
 form_id='DocumentationHelper_viewReportSubSectionTitleDescription',
 listbox_display_mode='FlatListMode')
 )
 for class_name in class_list:
 classmethod = dict().fromkeys([x.split('.')[-1] for x in classmethods if x.startswith(class_name)]).keys()
 classmethod.sort()
 result.append(
 ReportSection(
 level=4,
 title=class_name,
 form_id='')
 )
 result.append(
 ReportSection(
 form_id='PortalTypeDocumentationHelperAppendixClassMethod_view',
 selection_params=dict(class_method_list=classmethod, obj=uri_object),
 selection_name='class_method_selection',
 listbox_display_mode='FlatListMode')
 )
 if propertysheet.keys() != []:
 result.append(
 ReportSection(
 level=3,
 title="Property Sheets",
 form_id='')
 )
 property_sheet_description="This section describe the documentation of common class methods"
 property_sheet_description+=" used for documented business templates"
 result.append(
 ReportSection(
 selection_params=dict(description=property_sheet_description),
 selection_name='documentation_helper_selection',
 path=context.getPortalObject().portal_classes.getRelativeUrl(),
 form_id='DocumentationHelper_viewReportSubSectionTitleDescription',
 listbox_display_mode='FlatListMode')
 )
 result.append(
 ReportSection(
 form_id='PortalTypeDocumentationHelperAppendixPropertySheet_view',
 selection_params=dict(property_sheet_list=propertysheet.keys(), obj=uri_object),
 selection_name='property_sheet_selection',
 listbox_display_mode='FlatListMode')
 )
 class_name = 'PortalTypePropertySheetDocumentationHelper'
 propertysheets = propertysheet.values()
 propertysheets.sort(compareFileName)
 for uri in propertysheets:
 result.append(
 ReportSection(
 level=4,
 title=uri.split('/')[-1].split('.')[0],
 form_id='')
 )
 result.append(
 ReportSection(
 path=context.getPortalObject().portal_classes.getRelativeUrl(),
 method_id='getDocumentationHelper',
 form_id='%s_view' % class_name,
 param_list=[class_name,
 uri],
 listbox_display_mode='FlatListMode')
 )
 return result
